name: Coins and Bullets(LD40)
description:
My first project in Unity, made for LD40(The more you have, the worse it is)

The more coins you get game gets harder(more bullets and they are faster).

Collect as much coins as you can, good luck ;)

Something like bug that I choose to leave in game:

You can go to the walls to get faster to the other side but that's very risky.
